TASK: Craft an item of type: red_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "rotten_flesh", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 27, "index": 14}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 19}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 20}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 41, "index": 27}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 58, "index": 33}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft red_concrete_powder, I need to place 1 red_dye and 4 sand side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the red_dye from slot 18 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
